settings.text: Be the first to know about new collections and exclusive offers.

settings.faq_ans: Orders received before 4PM ET, Monday – Friday are typically processed the same day.Orders received outside of that will be processed the next business day.

Due to the nature of the items sold on this website, we unfortunately do not accept returns, unless the item is defective.Please contact us should you have a defective item.
Our standard warranty is 30-days from the date of receipt of the item.

settings.faq_ques: Do You Deliver Outside the USA?
settings.faq_ans: At this time we deliver only to the United States and Puerto Rico. Delivery is done using US Postal Service or UPS in discrete packages.

settings.faq_ques: What Do Your Packages Look Like?
settings.faq_ans: All packages are delivered in nondescript packaging. The address label includes “GVSX” for the return address. No logos or other identifiable information is included about what the package contents include.

settings.faq_ques: What Payment Methods Do You Accept?
settings.faq_ans: We currently accept payment using credit card (Amex, Visa, MasterCard, Discover), PayPal and Apple Pay.

settings.faq_ques: What Other Products Do You Sell?
settings.faq_ans: We specialize in online adult oriented products including lingerie and adult toys.
